game.shortDescription: Adventure and fight in a medieval fantasy open world! Build heroic characters with various abilities, travel through villages, cities, or perilous dungeons. Strategic turn-based combat system and advanced character building - Fog of war, charging and flanking, and more in the fast-paced Arena mode.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Adventure and fight in a medieval fantasy open world! Build heroic characters with various abilities, travel through villages, cities, or perilous dungeons. Strategic turn-based combat system and advanced character building - Fog of war, charging and flanking, and more in the fast-paced Arena mode.

reviewHighlights.text: 솔직히 재밌음. 그리고 제작자가 구현하려고 잡아놓은 틀을 전부 구현하면 취향만 맞으면 갓겜이라고 생각함. 나는 지금 상태로도 정말 재밌게 하고 있음. 하지만 이걸 다 구현하는 것은 절대로 불가능할 것이라고 봄. 그래픽과 스토리는 완전히 포기한 상태로 구현해 놨는데 지금...
